page.title: 02SW BASINGSTOKE: HOUSING 1
page.content: On{Brighton Hill}the houses are mainly{terraced,}of modern design. Most have two storeys. These are interspersed with{flats}and{ {maisonettes.}Many houses face onto green areas with pathways, and back onto access roads which are named after composers. The houses are grouped in blocks. The green areas have playgrounds with swings and roundabouts in the middle. The majority of the houses have 3 bedrooms with a bathroom and toilet combined. Downstairs they have a hallway, lounge and a kitchen/dining room. Other houses on{Brighton hill}are mainly {private and semi_detached}with open-plan front gardens. These houses front onto roads, but have private backgardens.
